IRS8975.AdditionalInformationTxt: We are submitting this Country-by-Country (CbC) Report pursuant to the CbC reporting requirements of United States for the fiscal year beginning January 01, 2017 and ending December 31, 2017. Please note that this CbC report should be automatically exchanged with the tax authorities of the following jurisdictions only, based on having the required CbC reporting requirements, competent authority agreements, and exchange of information agreements in force as of the date the CbC report was prepared: Australia, Belgium, Brazil, Canada, Colombia, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Korea, Rep of, Mexico, Netherlands, New Zealand, Poland, Portugal, South Africa, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom. All other jurisdictions listed in this CbC report are not entitled to CbC report through automatic exchange due to a lack of CbC requirements or are receiving the report through other means.These jurisdictions have not implemented CbC reporting requirements: Hong Kong, Panama, Philippines, Thailand, Turkey, Untd A Emirates, Venezuela. These jurisdictions have implemented CbC reporting requirements, but the requirements do not apply for the fiscal year covered by this report due to the effective date of the jurisdiction's requirements, the applicable group revenue threshold of the jurisdiction's requirements, or other exemption from reporting provided by the jurisdiction: Japan, Switzerland. These jurisdictions require a CbC report for the fiscal year covered by this report but do not have the required information exchange agreements and/or competent authority agreements in place for the automatic exchange of CbC reports with United States as of the date the CbC report was prepared: Argentina, Chile, China, India, Indonesia, Malaysia, Peru, Russia, Singapore, Taiwan, Vietnam.
